  30. ‌let line_buffer = Lexing.from_function read_user_input

  32. ‌let loop ppf = line_loop ppf line_buffer; stop_user_input ()

  34. ‌let current_duration = ref (-1L)

  36. ‌let rec protect ppf restart loop =
  37.   try
  38.     loop ppf
  39.   with
  40.   | End_of_file ->
  41.       protect ppf restart (function ppf ->
  42.         forget_process
  43.           !current_checkpoint.c_fd
  44.           !current_checkpoint.c_pid;
  45.         pp_print_flush ppf ();
  46.         stop_user_input ();
  47.         restart ppf)
  48.   | Toplevel ->
  49.       protect ppf restart (function ppf ->
  50.         pp_print_flush ppf ();
  51.         stop_user_input ();
  52.         restart ppf)
  53.   | Sys.Break ->
  54.       protect ppf restart (function ppf ->
  55.         fprintf ppf "Interrupted.@.";
  56.         Exec.protect (function () ->
  57.           stop_user_input ();
  58.           if !loaded then begin
  59.             try_select_frame 0;
  60.             show_current_event ppf;
  61.           end);
  62.         restart ppf)
  63.   | Current_checkpoint_lost ->
  64.       protect ppf restart (function ppf ->
  65.         fprintf ppf "Trying to recover...@.";
  66.         stop_user_input ();
  67.         recover ();
  68.         try_select_frame 0;
  69.         show_current_event ppf;
  70.         restart ppf)
  71.   | Current_checkpoint_lost_start_at (time, init_duration) ->
  72.       protect ppf restart (function ppf ->
  73.         let b =
  74.           if !current_duration = -1L then begin
  75.             let msg = sprintf "Restart from time %Ld and try to get \
  76.                                closer of the problem" time in
  77.             stop_user_input ();
  78.             if yes_or_no msg then
  79.               (current_duration := init_duration; true)
  80.             else
  81.               false
  82.             end
  83.           else
  84.             true in
  85.         if b then
  86.           begin
  87.             go_to time;
  88.             current_duration := Int64.div !current_duration 10L;
  89.             if !current_duration > 0L then
  90.               while true do
  91.                 step !current_duration
  92.               done
  93.             else begin
  94.               current_duration := -1L;
  95.               stop_user_input ();
  96.               show_current_event ppf;
  97.               restart ppf;
  98.             end
  99.           end
  100.         else
  101.           begin
  102.             recover ();
  103.             show_current_event ppf;
  104.             restart ppf
  105.           end)
  106.   | x ->
  107.       cleanup x kill_program

  109. ‌let execute_file_if_any () =
  110.   let buffer = Buffer.create 128 in
  111.   begin
  112.     try
  113.       let base = ".ocamldebug" in
  114.       let file =
  115.         if Sys.file_exists base then
  116.           base
  117.         else
  118.           Filename.concat (Sys.getenv "HOME") base in
  119.       let ch = open_in file in
  120.       fprintf Format.std_formatter "Executing file %s@." file;
  121.       while true do
  122. ‌        let line = string_trim (input_line ch) in
  123.         if line <> ""  && line.[0] <> '#' then begin
  124.           Buffer.add_string buffer line;
  125.           Buffer.add_char buffer '\n'
  126.         end
  127.       done;
  128.     with _ -> ()
  129.   end;
  130. ‌  let len = Buffer.length buffer in
  131.   if len > 0 then
  132. ‌    let commands = Buffer.sub buffer 0 (pred len) in
  133.     line_loop Format.std_formatter (Lexing.from_string commands);
  134.     stop_user_input ()

  136. ‌let toplevel_loop () =
  137.   interactif := false;
  138.   current_prompt := "";
  139.   execute_file_if_any ();
  140.   interactif := true;
  141.   current_prompt := debugger_prompt;
  142.   protect Format.std_formatter loop loop

  144. (* Parsing of command-line arguments *)

  146. exception Found_program_name

  148. ‌let anonymous s =
  149.   program_name := Unix_tools.make_absolute s; raise Found_program_name
  150. ‌let add_include d =
  151.   default_load_path :=
  152.     Misc.expand_directory Config.standard_library d :: !default_load_path
  153. ‌let set_socket s =
  154.   socket_name := s
  155. ‌let set_checkpoints n =
  156.   checkpoint_max_count := n
  157. ‌let set_directory dir =
  158.   Sys.chdir dir
  159. ‌let print_version () =
  160.   printf "The OCaml debugger, version %s@." Sys.ocaml_version;
  161.   exit 0

  163. ‌let print_version_num () =
  164.   printf "%s@." Sys.ocaml_version;
  165.   exit 0

  167. ‌let speclist = [
  168.    "-c", Arg.Int set_checkpoints,
  169.       "<count>  Set max number of checkpoints kept";
  170.    "-cd", Arg.String set_directory,
  171.       "<dir>  Change working directory";
  172.    "-emacs", Arg.Tuple [Arg.Set emacs; Arg.Set machine_readable],
  173.       "For running the debugger under emacs; implies -machine-readable";
  174.    "-I", Arg.String add_include,
  175.       "<dir>  Add <dir> to the list of include directories";
  176.    "-machine-readable", Arg.Set machine_readable,
  177.       "Print information in a format more suitable for machines";
  178.    "-s", Arg.String set_socket,
  179.       "<filename>  Set the name of the communication socket";
  180.    "-version", Arg.Unit print_version,
  181.       " Print version and exit";
  182.    "-vnum", Arg.Unit print_version_num,
  183.       " Print version number and exit";
  184.    "-no-version", Arg.Clear Parameters.version,
  185.       " Do not print version at startup";
  186.    "-no-prompt", Arg.Clear Parameters.prompt,
  187.       " Suppress all prompts";
  188.    "-no-time", Arg.Clear Parameters.time,
  189.       " Do not print times";
  190.    "-no-breakpoint-message", Arg.Clear Parameters.breakpoint,
  191.       " Do not print message at breakpoint setup and removal";
  192.    ]

  194. ‌let function_placeholder () =
  195.   failwith "custom printer tried to invoke a function from the debuggee"

  197. ‌let report report_error error =
  198.   eprintf "Debugger [version %s] environment error:@ @[@;%a@]@.;"
  199.     Config.version report_error error

  201. ‌let main () =
  202.   Callback.register "Debugger.function_placeholder" function_placeholder;
  203.   try
  204.     socket_name :=
  205.       (match Sys.os_type with
  206.         "Win32" ->
  207.           (Unix.string_of_inet_addr Unix.inet_addr_loopback)^
  208.           ":"^
  209.           (Int.to_string (10000 + ((Unix.getpid ()) mod 10000)))
  210.       | _ -> Filename.concat (Filename.get_temp_dir_name ())
  211.                                 ("camldebug" ^ (Int.to_string (Unix.getpid ())))
  212.       );
  213.     begin try
  214.       Arg.parse speclist anonymous "";
  215.       Arg.usage speclist
  216.         "No program name specified\n\
  217.          Usage: ocamldebug [options] <program> [arguments]\n\
  218.          Options are:";
  219.       exit 2
  220.     with Found_program_name ->
  221.       for j = !Arg.current + 1 to Array.length Sys.argv - 1 do
  222.         arguments := !arguments ^ " " ^ (Filename.quote Sys.argv.(j))
  223.       done
  224.     end;
  225.     if !Parameters.version
  226.     then printf "\tOCaml Debugger version %s@.@." Config.version;
  227.     Load_path.init ~auto_include:Compmisc.auto_include !default_load_path;
  228.     Clflags.recursive_types := true;    (* Allow recursive types. *)
  229.     toplevel_loop ();                   (* Toplevel. *)
  230.     kill_program ();
  231.     exit 0
  232.   with
  233.   | Toplevel ->
  234.       exit 2
  235.   | Persistent_env.Error e ->
  236.       report Persistent_env.report_error e;
  237.       exit 2
  238.   | Cmi_format.Error e ->
  239.       report Cmi_format.report_error e;
  240.       exit 2
